title: 03/02/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/02/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the MLB lockout. How will the delay affect fandom? NY Post Media Columnist calls in to talk about where Al Michaels will possibly land and how close Sean McVay came to taking a broadcasting job. And Albert Breer puts a pie bet on how many QBs he thinks will be taken in the 1st round of the 2022 NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
